posts.title: E-Papyrus

Engage in thought-provoking discussions, defend your perspectives, and refine your expertise. Whether it's cutting-edge technology, revolutionary theories, or industry-changing solutions, this is your platform to shine. Craft. Present. Impress. Let your words shape the future‚Äîone paper at a time!

posts.title: Euphoria
posts.content: Alone in Motion: A Solo Dance Performance
posts.description: Alone in Motion: A Solo Dance Performance is a captivating display of an individual's movement and expression. Through fluid choreography and emotive gestures, the performer takes the audience on a journey of self-discovery and introspection.

rules.rule1: 1. The competition will be conducted in two rounds 1.Preliminary Round 2. Spot choreography
rules.rule2: 2. In the preliminary round, the participant must dance on a song of their choice which should not exceed 5 minutes.
rules.rule3: 3. In the second round,spot choreography participant should dance on the song given to them .
rules.rule5: 5. The song selection can be from any language.
rules.rule6: 6. The participants exceeding the assigned time will be disqualified.
rules.rule7: 7. The performance will be evaluated based on the choreography, presentation,rhythm,expressions and costume.
rules.rule8: 8. Properties ,if any ,should be arranged by themselves and if any special arrangements are required the coordinators should be informed prior to the competition.
rules.rule9: 9. The decisions of the judges will be final.

posts.title: Group Dance
posts.content: Groove Clash: The Ultimate Group Dance Competition
posts.description: Groove Clash is a thrilling group dance competition where talented dance crews from all over the world battle it out to become the ultimate champions. With high energy performances, intricate choreography, and fierce competition, Groove Clash is a must-see event for fans of dance and entertainment.

rules.rule1: 1. There can be a maximum of 8 - 12 members and can have 2 teams from each college.
rules.rule2: 2. The performance should not convey any indecent gestures.
rules.rule3: 3. Dress Code and Makeup are not compulsory for the performance.
rules.rule4: 4. Each team should report and Submit the music for performance to committee members before an hour of program.
rules.rule6: 6. The song for performance will be of any language.
rules.rule7: 7. The judgement will be based on choreography, synchronisation and overall performance of the team.
rules.rule8: 8. The decision of the judges will be final.
rules.rule9: 9. Maximum 10 minutes of performance will be allowed

posts.title: NITHYARANGI 2023
posts.content: Themed Extravaganza: A Showdown of Creativity and Entertainment
posts.description: Themed Extravaganza: A Showdown of Creativity and Entertainment promises to be an exciting event where creativity and entertainment will collide to create a spectacular showcase of talent and imagination.

rules.rule1: 1 This is a group event, the group can include 10-15 members.
rules.rule2: 2 Multiple entries from the same institute are allowed.
rules.rule3: 3 The fashion show does not follow any particular theme. It is an open theme event.
rules.rule4: 4 Each group will be allotted a time limit of 10-15 minutes.
rules.rule5: 5 Negative marking will be done if this time limit is exceeded.
rules.rule6: 6 Teams should report at the backstage 15min prior to the scheduled time.
rules.rule7: 7 Participants should carry thier own inventories(music, costumes and presentation will be their own)
rules.rule8: 8 Background music must be submitted in a USB or Google drive prior to the event.
rules.rule9: 9 Any indecency in costumes or perfomance by the members will not be tolerated.
rules.rule10: 10 Teams will be judged according to not only their outfit, but also the way they carry themselves on stage.
rules.rule11: 11 Theme, hair, makeup and attitude on stage will also be considered by the judges.
rules.rule13: NB: If the competing groups is less than 3, only the first place will be awarded.

posts.title: Tharang Band
posts.content: Battle of the Bands: The Ultimate Showdown
posts.description: Battle of the Bands: The Ultimate Showdown is a music competition where different bands compete against each other to win the title of the best band. The competition is known for its high energy performances and fierce competition, making it a thrilling experience for both the participating bands and the audience.

rules.rule1: 1. The competition will be conducted in one round.
rules.rule2: 2. Band will have 5 minutes to set up the instruments and 10 minutes to perform
rules.rule4: 4. All the members in a band should report backstage atleast 10 minutes prior to the scheduled time.
rules.rule5: 5. Instruments should be arranged by themselves. No instruments willl be provided by the coordinators
rules.rule6: 6. Each band  should comprise a maximum of 10 members with atleast 3 instruments.
rules.rule7: 7. Each members must carry their ID card with them.
rules.rule8: 8. The organizer' s has the discretion to alter the rules at any time.

posts.title: Humour
posts.content: Laugh Riot: The Stand-Up Comedy Showdown

rules.rule1: 1. Each comedian will be given a   maximum of 5 minutes to perform their set. Going over the time limit may result in deduction in points.
rules.rule2: 2. The comedian must perform original material. Plagiarism or using another comedian's material may result in disqualification.
rules.rule3: 3. The content of the comedian's set must be appropriate for a general audience. The use of hate speech, slurs, or any material deemed offensive may result in disqualification.
rules.rule4: 4. The use of light props or costumes can used upto a limit for the performance.
rules.rule5: 5. Each contestant will be judged on the basis of their content, presentation, instincts & sense of humour.
rules.rule6: 6. The judges' decisions are final and cannot be appealed.
rules.rule7: 7. Any violation of the rules may result in disqualification from the¬†competition.
